about_the_game:
You've been trapped in a cursed elevator that inevitably brings you to the 0th floor. To escape, follow the instructions posted on the notice.

According to the notice, you must:


- Immediately close the door if you find anything unusual on the floor you arrive at.

- If there's nothing on the floor, wait for the door to close.

- Do not make any rash moves if the floor you arrive at is filled with red light.

- Close the door immediately if you're about to be attacked on the floor.

- Move between floors in the order listed on the notice.


Follow the instructions to escape.



※This game is inspired by "The Exit 8".

Volume

There are 7 types of stages in total.
There are 4 types of floors for each of the 7 levels, making a total of 28 types.
There are 112 types of anomalies in total.

Play time

Single play: 10 to 60 minutes
Complete clear: 90 to 420 minutes

Video Distribution Guidelines

- Regardless of whether you are an individual or a corporation, you can stream without a license.
- Monetization is only allowed using the features provided by the video streaming sites.
- It would be appreciated if you could include the game's name in the video or stream title and link to the Steam page in the description or similar sections.


Furthermore, we bear no responsibility for any damages resulting from streaming videos of this game.
※The contents of this guideline are subject to change without notice.

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy 0th floor. - The cursed elevator to floor zero -

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You've been trapped in an elevator that always goes to the 0th floor. Don't overlook any anomalies, and try to move to the designated floors.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
